name: Boyns Information Systems Ltd.
tagline: Information Technology and Services in Ruthin.
description:
Boyns Information Systems Ltd. is a supplier of IT related Products and Services. Due to the diverse skill set of my employees, our portfolio of customers is varied and includes many vertical sectors over a wide geographic area including South, Mid and North Wales, Cheshire and Shropshire.
In addition, as part of our Portfolio we manage our own WISP (Wireless Internet Service Provider) which covers a large area of the Vale of Clwyd and towards the more rural areas of south west Denbighshire.
READ MORE...
